common.condition_behavior_description: How the state should match on the targeted vacuum cleaners.
common.trigger_behavior_description: The behavior of the targeted vacuum cleaners to trigger on.

is_cleaning.description: Tests if one or more vacuum cleaners are cleaning.

behavior.description: How the state should match on the targeted vacuum cleaners.
behavior.name: Behavior

is_cleaning.name: Vacuum cleaner is cleaning

is_docked.description: Tests if one or more vacuum cleaners are docked.

behavior.description: How the state should match on the targeted vacuum cleaners.
behavior.name: Behavior

is_docked.name: Vacuum cleaner is docked

is_encountering_an_error.description: Tests if one or more vacuum cleaners are encountering an error.

behavior.description: How the state should match on the targeted vacuum cleaners.
behavior.name: Behavior

is_encountering_an_error.name: Vacuum cleaner is encountering an error

is_paused.description: Tests if one or more vacuum cleaners are paused.

behavior.description: How the state should match on the targeted vacuum cleaners.

is_paused.name: Vacuum cleaner is paused

is_returning.description: Tests if one or more vacuum cleaners are returning to the dock.

behavior.description: How the state should match on the targeted vacuum cleaners.
behavior.name: Behavior

is_returning.name: Vacuum cleaner is returning

clean_spot.description: Tells the vacuum cleaner to do a spot clean-up.
clean_spot.name: Clean spot

return_to_base.description: Tells the vacuum cleaner to return to its dock.
return_to_base.name: Return to dock

send_command.description: Sends a command to the vacuum cleaner.

command.description: Command to execute. The commands are integration-specific.
command.name: Command

params.description: Parameters for the command. The parameters are integration-specific.
params.name: Parameters

send_command.name: Send command

set_fan_speed.description: Sets the fan speed of the vacuum cleaner.

fan_speed.description: Fan speed. The value depends on the integration. Some integrations have speed steps, like 'medium'. Some use a percentage, between 0 and 100.
fan_speed.name: Fan speed

set_fan_speed.name: Set fan speed

start.description: Starts or resumes the cleaning task.
start.name: Start

start_pause.description: Starts, pauses, or resumes the cleaning task.
start_pause.name: Start/pause

turn_off.description: Stops the current cleaning task and returns to its dock.
turn_off.name: Turn off

docked.description: Triggers after one or more vacuums have returned to dock.

behavior.description: The behavior of the targeted vacuum cleaners to trigger on.
behavior.name: Behavior

docked.name: Vacuum returned to dock

errored.description: Triggers after one or more vacuums encounter an error.

behavior.description: The behavior of the targeted vacuum cleaners to trigger on.
behavior.name: Behavior

errored.name: Vacuum encountered an error

paused_cleaning.description: Triggers after one or more vacuums pause cleaning.

behavior.description: The behavior of the targeted vacuum cleaners to trigger on.
behavior.name: Behavior

paused_cleaning.name: Vacuum cleaner paused cleaning

started_cleaning.description: Triggers after one or more vacuums start cleaning.

behavior.description: The behavior of the targeted vacuum cleaners to trigger on.
behavior.name: Behavior

started_cleaning.name: Vacuum cleaner started cleaning

started_returning.description: Triggers after one or more vacuums start returning to dock.

behavior.description: The behavior of the targeted vacuum cleaners to trigger on.
behavior.name: Behavior

started_returning.name: Vacuum cleaner started returning to dock
